title: China, Ukraine, And Markets (Podcast)
itunes:title: China, Ukraine, And Markets (Podcast)
description:
Hans Dau, CEO of the Mitchell Madison Group, talks about China cutting interest rates and concern over China’s economy. Jay Hatfield, CEO at Infrastructure Capital Management, discusses investing and his market outlook. Dr. Ariel Cohen, Senior Fellow at the Atlantic Council Eurasia Center, discusses the Ukraine war, Vladimir Putin, and the risks ahead for Ukraine and the world. Ann Hand, CEO and Chairwoman at Super League Gaming, joins the show to talk about gaming expansion and outlook for the industry amid inflation. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
